newsitem.title: UK: OPEC basket price rises to $22.59 last week.
newsitem.headline: OPEC basket price rises to $22.59 last week.

text.p: The price of OPEC's basket of seven crudes rose to $22.59 per barrel last week from $22.03 the previous week, the OPEC news agency OPECNA said on Monday.
Quoting figures released by the OPEC Secretariat, it said the price so far this year has averaged $19.38.
In September it averaged $21.68, against $19.94 in August and $19.29 in July.
In the third quarter of 1996 so far it has averaged $20.22, against $19.26 in the second.
The basket comprises Algeria's Saharan Blend, Indonesia's Minas, Nigeria's Bonny Light, Saudi Arabia's Arabian Light, Dubai of the UAE, Venezuela's Tia Juana and Mexico's Isthmus.
